archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.1.9g: g) the division of responsibility for security between the organisation and the supplier, evaluating the implementation of controls for both (e.g. through the ISF Supplier Security Evaluation (SSE) tool or the ISF Security Healthcheck)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
